name: SPACE MAZE (itch) (PressF Games)
description:
Welcome to  SPACE MAZE !

This is a 2D shooter game where the objective is to locate and eliminate mysterious black holes that suddenly appeared and are now releasing hostile alien spaceships that endanger the peace of this galaxy.

Please note that this project is a part of Game Development course and the following details are specific to that course and my peers, so feel free to ignore them :

  • UI over haul .
  • Created 4 levels with increasing difficulty and complexity.
  • Added 2 Powerups (Fire rate powerup & healing consumable).
  • Visual changes in the Player, enemies and the projectiles.
  • Added Health Bar for both player and enemies.
  • Animated all the UI pages.
  • Added a simple progressions system (cannot access a level without finishing the previous one).
  • Fixed bugs where the chasers won't collide with the player and explode.
  • Fixed enemy explosion animation when enemies collide with player.
